title: When CM Arvind Kejriwal sang ‘Hum Honge Kamyaab’ at I-Day event
article_body: NEW DELHI: Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal marked the 72ndby singing lines from the famous song, ' Hum Honge Kamyaab' at an event in Delhi's Chhatrasal Stadium.In a video, the Delhi chief minister can be seen humming the lines of the famous song at the event.The Hindi song is an adaptation of the gospel song, which became the protest anthem during the American Civil Rights Movement. In India, it was translated by renowned poet Girija Kumar Mathur.Earlier in the day, the chief minister in a tweet, quoted lines from Muhammad Iqbal's 'Sare Jahan Se Achcha' to wish the people of the country.
description: In a video, the Delhi chief minister can be seen humming the lines of the famous song at the eventEarlier in the day, the chief minister in a tweet, quoted lines from Muhammad Iqbal's 'Sare Jahan Se Achcha' to wish the people of the country on the occasion of Independence Day
